Reviews.Title: not the best, but not the worst
Reviews.Author: E. May
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a replacement for my Nikon coolpix that I dropped, but couldn't find a new Nikon cp that was in my price range that had AA batteries.  I read other reviews/features for the GE and thought it was the best deal for my money.  I'm an artist so I take lots of photos of animals and kids for reference.  This camera has lots of great scene settings and does have a good stop action.  The price is good, and the high mp lets me enlarge my photos also.  It's almost impossible to find a camera with AA batteries, and is one of the main reasons I chose this.  So it has many great features that I like, however, the things I don't like, that are very annoying for me, is although the iso is 1600, like the nikon, the nikon takes great photos in almost darkness, without flash and this one takes lousy low light photos.  if it's even the least low light, it suggests a tripod and does a slow shutter speed.  It's impossible to get a clear photo in low light if you don't want to use a flash.  Also, I don't like to use the flash unless I absolutely have to because of color accuracy.  Therefore, I generally leave it turned off.  You can't do that with this camera.  Everytime you turn the camera on, you have to turn the flash back off.  Also, everytime you turn the camera on, you must choose your scene or auto setting.  You can't just turn the camera on and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera- Highly Recommended!
Reviews.Author: Julien
Reviews.Content: 5/5 on this Camera. I highly recommend this purchase. It produces amazing image and video quality and has great built in speakers for sound. The power consumption on the batteries isn't too too bad. I suppose it could be better but they use AA batteries and those really don't cost a lot of money at all so it's not a problem for me.Great little buy for $59.00! If you're looking for just a basic point and shoot camera for outdoor events, portraits, parties, or you just want to record something relatively close to you- go for it!

Reviews.Title: Good For the Price
Reviews.Author: kindasorta
Reviews.Content: Overall a very good camera 'for the price.'  As with any pocket point and shoot camera its fantastic outdoors, ok indoors, and passable in low light situations.  There are a ton of different modes for different situations, and most of them work very well.  Not much shutter lag and battery life is excellent.  I was able to take about 400 pictures with the included AA batteries, many with the flash on which is very impressive.  Panorama is a nice feature but you have to line up the shots manually, which is often difficult to do and get a good panorama.The cons:  Its very light and portable which is a pro, and a con.  Its very light in your pocket but seems very fragile, one waist high drop would probably kill this thing.  The wrist strap included also does not adjust to your wrist so I would suggest an adjustable strap instead. Also the shutter release button is very cheap feeling and flimsy.  Its often hard to detect when the button is halfway down when trying to focus.  The camera also 'forgets' settings when powered off like suppressing the flash, digital zoom off etc, which is quite irritating.  Lastly, this camera has difficulty focusing on a subject properly when zoomed into an object, long range photos often come out slightly out of focus.Why four stars then?  Because generally speaking for casual use, the photos are fantastic...for the price.  If you're a serious photographer I'd opt for a better model but for basic snapshots and such, this does a passable job and gets good battery life.

Reviews.Title: Good point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Lewis Martin
Reviews.Content: I needed a simple camera that workes well to keep in my truck.This camera is a great point and shoot camera, it does everything I need it to do.I have taken about 100 photos so far, this camera works well and takes clear pictures.I haven't changed the batteries yet so it must be good on battery life.This camera takes pictures as clear as my Nikon Cool Pix L810.

Reviews.Title: Complex enough for my 12-year-old...
Reviews.Author: David Rinehart
Reviews.Content: ...and simple enough for me!Purchased as a present for said child. He has had great fun with the various photo modes, and has used the panorama function to produce some interesting photographs.I have been impressed with the clarity of the photos, especially close-ups using the macro function that he recently discovered.

Reviews.Title: Fun little camera!
Reviews.Author: Nana
Reviews.Content: Surprised that such an inexpensive little camera takes good pictures. I like the little cameras...just drop them in your pocket or in a pocket in you purse. I like to use AA batteries, too...just swap them out when they are dead...only takes a few seconds. The video is fun, but the zoom in and out action is not smooth. It has all kinds of bells and whistles that I haven't tried yet...normally I just take pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: RHM
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera, I was very easy to get to understand button uses,The pictures come out real great

Reviews.Title: It's No Sony, but It's Okay!
Reviews.Author: Kodybear
Reviews.Content: This is a relatively good camera for the price point and has some nice features. I love that it takes AA batteries which are available everywhere! And I like the fact that it uses a SDHC card and that it is plug and play. Just insert the card, bam, instant memory. You NEED to use an SDHC card because the internal memory is NOTHING! This is definitely a good point and shoot camera. And I love the zoom feature. It comes with a wrist cord but you should definitely invest in a camera case.

Reviews.Title: Awesomeness
Reviews.Author: KrijgerGeist
Reviews.Content: Lovin the Panorama shots.  I can take pictures of people and Pan-shot myself in the picture as if I was there with them.Took this camera clubbin, there is no night vision, so video was dark.  It would have been awkward if we brought a bright light in a dark place where people are dancing.  But then again for the price, who can complain.Also took pictures at nighttime (without extra lights), pictures came out not too good.  Person in the picture came out looking weird with the background really dark.  But when I shot the video (at night, same place, same ambient lighting), the video came out much better than the pictures.  (Mind you I'm still learning how to use the features)So to remedy this trivial situation, I just take videos (during nightime) and upload the mov files to Final Cut Pro, capture the still images, and voila!  Perfect images captured.  FCP can also do color correction and image brightening but that's for another review.  I've become a lazy amateur pseudo-photographer so I just shoot videos and pick out the favorite images.Havent dropped this camera yet (no intention to).  Instead of buying one of those soft case camera bags for 10-20 bucks, I splurged on a $1 Glasses Case (made in Tokyo).  It fits perfectly with a long lanyard sticking out.  It is also probably the best protection for this camera.  And since it's in a glasses case, it may not attract camera thieves in the local nightclub.Another awesome thing about this camera = disposable battery usage.  But do not buy the 99 cents only batteries, they do not work on this camera for some reason.  Spend the extra $2-3 on batteries and they can last you a couple of events/nights of photo/videography.Awesomeness :)

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Shannon Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It is light, compact & takes great pictures. It was an extremely great price for such a great camera. I would recommend this to anyone on a budget who needs a camera. We took our daughter to Disneyland, & used the camera there and it was great.

Reviews.Title: Worth the price
Reviews.Author: joel lewis
Reviews.Content: Great product for the price.  Works great to take several pics on family outings, simple but effective.  Would invest in a camera with better quality pics in the dark.

Reviews.Title: LOVIN THIS!
Reviews.Author: ShammyD
Reviews.Content: As my description states, I'm LOVIN this. The picture quality is AWESOME and and the camera is rather intuitive. I love it so much, I'll be buying another just to have on deck.

Reviews.Title: Not good!
Reviews.Author: Vera N. Pate
Reviews.Content: Camera didn't last very long.  Worked for short while then would not take the pictures. Very disappointed with this product.

Reviews.Title: Customer service followup?
Reviews.Author: Debra Heitmann
Reviews.Content: I like this camera.  However, I am finding that it goes through batteries in a heartbeat.  I am getting just a handful of shots before I get a warning that the battery life is gone.  I have tried both rechargeable and good quality Alkaline batteries.  I have both called and emailed General Imaging, and I did get a reply after a few days.  I will now send in the camera for repair.

Reviews.Title: Digital Camera by General Imaging
Reviews.Author: cactasJR
Reviews.Content: Its a Great Camera, very easy to use. Nice interface directions. Takes fantastic video & photos. One word of advice, purchase the accessory kit, as in SD Card, Camera Case & Batteries with Charger @ time of purchase. I did not & it ended up costing more then if I would of purchased the complete package at once. This Camera will also give you a Mega Pixel Choice. If you don't want to take a photo in 14 megapix you have the option of using a lover resolution. Although it will accept a 32 HD San Disk Card, I went with 2 16s. High Capacity Cards. One for Videos & One for Photos.

Reviews.Title: THIS IS AN AWESOME CAMERA!!
Reviews.Author: pfunkzuppo "Pam2010"
Reviews.Content: Great price for the camera-- I'm not too tech-savvy, so I needed a very user friendly camera...and this is it!! Remember, you have to buy the memory cards for it. If not, the camera shoots like 3 photos and then you have to download or delete those three to take any more photos...the memory card needed for it is listed under the product's description and 'what other people bought" section.It's sleek, it runs on 2 triple AAA batteries, and very easy to use and to download. Love it!

Reviews.Title: It's dependable.
Reviews.Author: Helen Zalas
Reviews.Content: It works like my expensive camera.  It's small and convenient to carry in my purse all the time.  I'm happy with it.

Reviews.Title: very pleased
Reviews.Author: LAL "LAL"
Reviews.Content: I received the camera today, and tried it out on several situations. it is easy to use, very easy to trnafer. this camera is well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: bought as a gift
Reviews.Author: rtb
Reviews.Content: Son said he liked it  - keep in mind it is battery and not rechargeable.not bad for the price paid .

Reviews.Title: Darn good camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Jamaica Me Crazy "Janie"
Reviews.Content: Bought three of them for gifts, one each red, silver and black, $49.00, $59.00 and $69.00, so that averages out to about 60 bucks a piece. Oops, see that the price has gone up, now all three are $69.00.  But, still easy to use, has a capacity to shoot video, a pretty good screen size, for the overall size of the camera, which is small, palm sized or fits in your pocket size. Uses regular batteries, not rechargeable, which can be a pain when your battery runs down and you aren't anywhere you can charge it easily and does come with a fairly good sized memory card. Also has 14 mega pixels, which makes for really good pictures.  It wasn't that long ago  that I bought my expensive $500.00+ camera and it only had 7 mp, and not much else.  Definitely would recommend tis one.

Reviews.Title: Just what the photo opportunity called for!
Reviews.Author: Lois S. Murphy "murphl"
Reviews.Content: As I'm not smart enough to run a smart phone, I needed a digital camera to capture those things I want to capture!  This one fills the bill to perfection.  I love that it runs on batteries and is so easy to use.  Photos are sharp and clear and downloading them to my Mac is as simple as one could hope for.  I like it so much I bought one for my grandson's 10th birthday to take with him on our summer vacation.

Reviews.Title: A gift for my young nephew
Reviews.Author: Rhonda J. Hileman
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd camera like this I have purchased for my young nieces and nephews.  They love them and take great pictures.  The cameras have many of the options of the more expensive ones, but are priced more reasonably!

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: steve drexler
Reviews.Content: for the price it works well, just started using and pictures and are good would recomend to my friends thanks

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Betty
Reviews.Content: It has many different options for taking the best picture possible. It's pretty easy to use once you know which buttons to press to get to the scene options. I think anyone could enjoy this camera.

Reviews.Title: The aim light is too bright and literally blinds the audience
Reviews.Author: S. Subramanian "SS"
Reviews.Content: This camera has big buttons and good preview screen. I bought this as a gift for my Dad who has some vision problems. I was eve happy to see the video recording has a button and thought it will be easier for my Dad to use it that way. But when I asked my son to take a couple of pictures of me, noticed the aim light was way too bright and it literally blinded me for a few minutes and every time he clicked the camera, I couldnt control me blinking as the aim light was way too bright. I had to return it as my Dad wont be able to make any shots without making the audience blink or go temporarily blind. Too bad.

Reviews.Title: camera died after 10 days, awful battery life,ruined an event!
Reviews.Author: maa4kids
Reviews.Content: Please do yourself a favor ...stay away from this camera...the battery died after 10 minutes OF INSTALLING fresh batteries and an important event my daughter was in... I was unable to take any pics and am still upset about this!! there was no warning, u receive a low battery message and then immediately shuts off!! And now 10 days later i go to turn it on, and there seems to be a lens issue, the screen is black, i have tried everything to fix it! I am sending it back, it is probably the worst camera i have ever owned.

Reviews.Title: Wrong camera & not new like it has said in description
Reviews.Author: Timothy A. Wall
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed - its rare that I am unhappy with anything from Amazon but this camera was not new (it was described as such) & the model shipped was different than what was purchased.Amazon took care of me with a return & refund but that was extra hassle that I should not have had to deal with.

Reviews.Title: Trash
Reviews.Author: D. Bennette "jamaa7"
Reviews.Content: This camera didn't last a month.  First it wouldn't save pics to disc and wouldn't allow for further picture taking.  Then it wouldn't stay on.
